active.tooltip: Select a deity to raise a Chaos Altar to

icon.componentleveltooltip: Number of soldiers that will settle here.

happy.name: happy
happy.tooltip: Colonisation||This is the [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} bonus for the next turn only.

unhappy.name: unhappy
unhappy.tooltip: Conquest penalty||This is the [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} penalty that will be applied to the province for the next turn only.

icon.componentleveltooltip: Province instability||This is the [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} penalty that will be applied to the province, deteriorating at 1 point per turn.
Number of soldiers that will settle here.

cost.name: cost
cost.tooltip: Cost of setting up a settlement here. The more soldiers that settle, the lower the cost.

income.name: income
income.tooltip: Plunder this settlement and claim its riches for yourself!

no_income.name: no_income
no_income.tooltip: This settlement has just been plundered. A second attempt will yield no riches.

reduced_income.name: reduced_income
reduced_income.tooltip: This settlement has just been plundered. A second attempt will yield scarcely any riches.

icon.componentleveltooltip: Province instability||This is the [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} penalty that will be applied to the province, deteriorating at 1 point per turn.
